name: Ocha-Ken no Heya DS 2
description:
'Ocha-ken no Heya DS 2' (otherwise known as お茶犬の部屋DS2) is a virtual pet simulator developed by MTO for the Nintendo DS. The second installment of the DS lineup, it was released exclusively in Japan on January 18th, 2007. Based on a variety of different teas, it originated as a children's toy franchise by (J) SEGA Toys, but has since branched out among Nintendo gaming consoles.

Having a nostalgic throwback to the original dollhouse experience of the Game Boy Advance, revisit your favourite Ocha-pets in this brand new tale! The stage to play on has greatly expanded, making way for more decorations and pets to be placed inside Rooms and the Outside. Look forward to new actions, items and 36 minigames not found in the previous game!

By stroking, calling, playing with items, and communicating with the Ocha-pets, opportunities will open to help them learn new tricks. Additionally, the player can now not only create their very own ocha-pet, but also utilize the new 'Ocha-Ken Tsukuru' system to dress-up their pets. Try to unlock all 500+ types of furnishings, and visit the website of 'Ocha-Ken' to discover secret codes for your house.
